summary: LSECtin is one of a group of glycan-binding receptors encoded near the end of human chromosome 19. other receptors in the cluster include dendritic and endothelial cell receptors dendritic cell-intercellular adhesion molecule 1 grabbing nonintegrin (DC-SIGN) and the structurally related Fc-binding receptor CD23 (Soilleux et al. 2000) rin-mediated endocytosis can undergo antibody-induced
